nodes.text: Lake Weir was a lake on the planet of Melida/Daan. It was the only body of water near Zehava for a large distance. Originally, a Hall of Evidence was located above the lake, floating on repulsorlifts; however, with the Young's victory and the end of the war, it was destroyed by Nield and members of the Young forces as an initiative for peace.
Nield enjoyed spending time at Lake Weir as a child.
